active.name: Glaciate
active.effects: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing {{as|300|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 85% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies struck within and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 70% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. Enemies hit in the center of the cone are {{tip|root|rooted}} for the same duration instead.
